label: A11B16C5_cP64_208_bfh_adm_ce-001
title: Na$_{11}$U$_{5}$O$_{16}$ Structure
comments: (Bartram, 1970) say the atoms were ``arbitrarily placed'' at the Wyckoff positions listed, with $z_{8} = 0$.  This gives a U$_{1}$-O$_{3}$ distance of 2.38{\AA}.  They then set $z_{8} = -0.02$ ($0.52$ using our origin), giving a distance of 2.19{\AA}, which they consider ``more reasonable,'' but the other U-O distances remain at 2.39{\AA}.  If we find a refinement of this structure we will update this page.
